summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Leave In Conditioner with Almond Milk, Aloe Butter and Shea Oil for Extremely Damaged Hair, 8 fl oz Review Date: 2017/06/07 Store: Carol's Daughter Product Description: ['Reverses Damage'] Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': "Carol's Daughter", 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Hair Type': 'Curly, Damaged, Coily', 'Product Benefits': 'Repairs Damage, Strengthens and Protects Hair, Restores Softness for Over-Processed Hair', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.97 x 1.97 x 7.49 inches; 9.88 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'K4268600', 'UPC': '820645235120 755332169061', 'Manufacturer': "Carol's Daughter"} Review Text: My daughter has very, very thick wavy blonde hair. Not colored or processed. We've been using another conditioner in a primarily African American line but she didn't like the smell (coconut). This one has won her over completely. After she gets out of the shower, she puts a dime size dab in hand and coats her hands and then start at the ends works her way to the roots.

There is no residue and it washes out completely the next time so there are no flaky specs. Review Title: Carols Daughter Almond Milk Restoring Conditioner Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Green Goo Natural Skin Care for Eczema, Psoriasis, Cracked Hands and Feet, Black, Dry Skin, 1.82 Ounce Review Date: 2018/08/16 Store: Green Goo Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Green Goo', 'Scent': 'Dry Skin', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Active Ingredients': '*Achillea Millefolium (Yarrow) Flower Extract, *Calendula Officinalis (Calendula) Flower Oil, *Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower, *Sambucus Nigra (Elder) Flower, *Trifolium Pratense (Red Clover) Flower., Vitamin_e*Achillea Millefolium (Yarrow) Flower Extract, *Calendula Officinalis (Calendula) Flower Oil, *Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower, *Sambucus Nigra (Elder) Flower, *Trif… See more', 'Unit Count': '1.82 Ounce', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 0.5 inches; 1.2 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'GOO-05690', 'Department': 'Unisex-adult', 'Date First Available': 'April 22, 2016', 'Manufacturer': 'Green Goo'} Review Text: I got this because of a persistent dry spot on my neck and ear for over a year . The doctor said it was eczema and prescribed an ointment. Didn't help. I must have tried everything over the counter in the beauty aisle and health. Tried this as a last resort and bam! Within two days of four times a day, the dry spots were gone. Thanks!! Review Title: Green Goo Dry Skin Large Tin Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Jade Roller for Face,Anti-aging Jade Roller Massager Eye Jade Facial Roller for Women Puffiness, Real Jade 100% Natural Herbivore Jade Facial Roller Jade Stone Roller Set with Gua Sha Tool,Case,Pouch Review Date: 2018/12/07 Store: OYOROL Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5.91 x 2.2 x 0.59 inches; 8.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '799392612136'} Review Text: I never thought I would like these. I mean, come on a roller for your face? But I admit I was wrong. The first few times were pleasant. I used them to spread my face oil around but I read that it's much better if it's cool. I put it in the fridge for an hour and OMG! Total turnaround. The bags under my eyes shrunk a bit but it feels so much better. I don't see the cosmetic changes but the coolness against my face after a long day at work. Two thumbs up. Review Title: Jade Roller for Face Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: AG Care Natural Remedy Apple Cider Vinegar Leave On Mist Review Date: 2019/02/12 Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'AG Care', 'Item Form': 'Spray', 'Material Feature': 'Plant Based, Vegan', 'Hair Type': 'All, Color Treated', 'Product Benefits': 'Gently cleanses and seals cuticle to enhance shine. Superfoods and apple cider vinegar support soft, healthy hair.Gently cleanses and seals cuticle to enhance shine. Superfoods and apple cider vinegar support soft, healthy hair. See more', 'Product Dimensions': '1.75 x 1.75 x 6 inches; 6.14 Ounces', 'Item model number': '100150', 'UPC': '625336002391', 'Manufacturer': 'AG Hair', 'Country of Origin': 'Canada'} Review Text: I can't use this. It dried my very fine color treated out to make it look like red straw. My daughter who doesn't wash her hair every day loves it. Her hair is very thick and wavy and blonde. Softened her hair and...I am not joking...made it shine in the sun. She uses on the days when she doesn't wash (every three days). This keeps the buildup at bay.

My postal gal is pretty good about delivering packages but even with her careful handling, the plastic top was broken. No leaks. Review Title: AG Hair Natural Remedy Apple Cider Leave On Mist Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 4D Silk Fiber Lash Mascara Black, Waterproof Natural Thick Fiber Mascara, Thick Thickening Lengthening, Dramatic Extension Voluminous Eyelashes Mascara, No Clumping, No Smudging Lasting All Day Review Date: 2020/07/30 Store: SIKEMAY Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Color': 'black', 'Special Feature': 'Water, Smudge Proof, Non Clumping', 'Brand': 'SIKEMAY', 'Specialty': 'Waterproof, hypoallergenic', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '7.2 x 4 x 1.1 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '764690676838', 'Manufacturer': 'SIKEMAY'} Review Text: I have been search of the Holy Grail of mascaras for all my life. A few times, some have come close (Max Factor 2000 Calorie Mascara has been the closest). This product is so far off the mark, it's not funny. The price point is good but it is clumpy and although I didn't have a bad allergic reaction, I did get raccoon eyes and resembled Rocket from Guardians of the Galaxy. Not the look I was going for but in the deep South with 93 degrees and 100% humidity, I need a mascara that won't smear.

On the plus side, it came off with simple soap/cleanser but I'm still on the hunt for the perfect mascara. Review Title: 4D Silk Fiber Lash Mascara Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Grinding Away Skin Polishing Scrub, 3 fl. oz., Polishing Scrub Works to Improve Skin's Texture and Tone by Buffing Away Dead Skin Cells by Higher Education Skincare Review Date: 2020/08/10 Store: Higher Education Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoother', 'Material Feature': 'Gluten Free, Cruelty Free', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.59 x 3.58 x 1.61 inches; 3 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381031008'} Review Text: I loved this. A little goes a long way. I used St. Ives Peach Scrub but I think I like this better. For a less inexpensive scrub, this is a workhorse.

It was creamy and the scrub was not abrasive at all. I even used it on my neck where there was a small skin tag. Over the course of the week, it reduced the skin tag to nothing. The smell was nothing and the price is right on point. Review Title: Higher Education Skincare Scrub Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Kopari Peptide Glow Hydrating Moisturizer Face Cream | Hyaluronic Acid All Natural Vegan Coconut Lightweight Cream for Everday Use For Smooth Skin, Combats Fine Lines and Wrinkles | Cruelty Free 1.7oz Review Date: 2021/01/05 Store: Kopari Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Kopari', 'Scent': 'Coconut', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '2.9 x 2.9 x 2.3 inches; 1.7 Ounces', 'UPC': '850004184349'} Review Text: I have used Kopari products before but only their lip products which are phenomenal. This is such a rich cream, better for me to use at night. I don't like to use many products at once and this can replace my eye cream and cuticle oil.

I wake up with the softest baby bottom skin I've not had in several years. The price is reasonable for those not wanting to spend too much money on skincare. Review Title: Kopari Facial Moisturizer - Water Moisture Cream Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
**Preferences and Trends Summary:**

1. **Hair Care Focus**: Strong preference for products targeting hair damage and curl enhancement. Natural and effective formulations are favored, especially those with restorative properties.

2. **Skin Care Solutions**: Emphasis on natural remedies for skin issues. Products that rapidly alleviate conditions like eczema and improve overall skin texture are prioritized, with a tendency towards high ratings for effectiveness.

3. **Innovative Tools**: Interest in unconventional skincare tools (e.g., jade roller) indicates a willingness to try new methods for enhancing beauty routines, especially those that provide relaxation or cooling effects.

4. **Diverse Product Types**: Engages with a wide range of product formats, including creams, sprays, and scrubs, demonstrating openness to various application methods as long as they deliver results.

5. **Ingredient Consciousness**: Repeated preference for cruelty-free, natural, and vegan formulations suggests a commitment to ethical and health-conscious buying.

6. **Disappointment in Cosmetics**: Frustration over ineffective makeup products (e.g., mascara) indicates a discerning approach to beauty products, particularly in quality and performance.

7. **Strong Satisfaction**: Consistent high ratings and positive feedback on effective products reflect overall satisfaction with quality findings in hair and skincare. 

Overall, this individual's shopping behavior exhibits a clear trend towards natural, effective, and innovative products tailored for hair and skin care, coupled with an exploration of beauty tools.

target_interaction.title: JoBand Hairband
target_interaction.text: Great for for fine hair.  Grips and doesn't move.  I love the colors and best of all, it doesn't cause a headache.
target_interaction.title_meta: JOBAND Fashion hairband women hair headband Teeth Comb Hair Hoop Hair band Soft Comfy Non-slip Hair Accessories for Women/Girl(4 color)
